data.decision: Duro Roadmap v3 - Phases 2.2-2.5 and Phase 4.1-4.3 complete
data.rationale: Yesterday (2026-02-15) we completed: Phase 2.2-2.5 (adversarial testing, property tests, stress tests, fuzzing - 280 tests total), Phase 4.2 (eval suite with 15 evals), Phase 4.3 (rules expansion + enforcement CI). Next: Phase 4.4 Production Testing (synthetic episode, then Fashanus).
data.context: Previous roadmap decision was stale. User confirmed we did production work. Phase 3.0 entry criteria all checked. Current focus should be Phase 4.4 Production Testing.

evidence.notes: Synthetic episode completed successfully. Phase 4.4 Production Testing is now in progress.
